quoteText: If we suspend or terminate your account, you will no longer have access to any parts of the website, including data, messages, files, and other material you keep on the site. You may NOT continue to use our website under a different or new account name.
title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
